name: ZenText
description:
ZenText Prototype V2

ZenText is a prototype game produced by Sleepless Inc.

This isn't a production quality game. It is a strictly limited preview.

This version is meant only to demonstrate the basic game play mechanics, and give the player a feeling for how a final, published version of the game might look and sound.

We're asking for criticism, feedback, and suggestions. Based on this feedback we may proceed with a full, production quality version of the game as a Steam and mobile app.

Note: This game preview collects ANONYMOUS information while you're playing, such as your IP address, the words you spell, when you reset the game or change settings. You can NOT be personally identified by this data. Please do not play the game if this is not acceptable to you.

Please send your feedback:

zentext@sleepless.com

Thank you!

---

This game uses Squids (TM) technology and the the time honored principles of Squidilogy (TM).
